segments.text: your call has been forwarded to voicemail.
the person you're trying to reach is not available.
at the tone, please record your message.
when you have finished recording, you may hang up.
i'm calling you from lending club p2p lending platform.
uh, this call in regards to your lending for <PII_AMOUNT>, which was done last year and now it's been matured.
and the amount is in your account balance for, uh, <PII_AMOUNT> rupees.
so, let me know if you have any queries, like if you want to re-lend the amount, uh, you can reach out to me, i can guide you further.
